channel.title: Server Console
channel.description:
Hello all... ;D
I'm running a server that has a "Server Console" this is how it works...when you run the server it starts up and show the runserver window + traffic and a Server Console called, "Miss. Silabsoft Server Console".
In this console you can:
* Ban * Banip * Kick * msg (send message to all server) * nick (Changes player name)
I need help to customize this console :) Also if you know about this, What commands can be used on this, apart the ones I said? :|
I can't rember other commands but thats what basically this Console does...any help will be appreciated :D

item.title: Server Console
item.dc:creator: @VyperX VyperX
item.description:
@VyperX wrote:

Hello all… ;D

I’m running a server that has a “Server Console” this is how it works…when you run the server it starts up and show the runserver window + traffic and a Server Console called, “Miss. Silabsoft Server Console”.

In this console you can:

* Ban
* Banip
* Kick
* msg (send message to all server)
* nick (Changes player name)

I need help to customize this console Also if you know about this, What commands can be used on this, apart the ones I said?

I can’t rember other commands but thats what basically this Console does…any help will be appreciated

Read full topic
